author: Safia Samee Ali
title: As parents fight on COVID-19 front lines, volunteers step in to take care of their families
description: Hundreds have signed up to volunteer child care services to healthcare workers on frontlines of Covid19 fight
content:
CHICAGO Quarantined and starting to feel helpless, public school teacher Danielle Chalfie was desperately looking for some way to contribute to the fight against COVID-19, which has already infected over 1,000 people in Chicago.
While she wasnt suited to fig… [+4032 chars]
